trans-unit.source: Specifies the execution states of a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir kjøring av tilstander for en <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ThreadState enumeration is of interest only in a few debugging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen ThreadState er interessert i noen scenarier-feilsøking.

trans-unit.source: Your code should never use the thread state to synchronize the activities of threads.
trans-unit.target: Koden bør aldri bruke tilstanden tråd skal synkroniseres aktiviteter med tråder.

trans-unit.source: ThreadState defines a set of all possible execution states for threads.
trans-unit.target: ThreadState definerer et sett med alle mulige kjøring tilstander for tråder.

trans-unit.source: Once a thread is created, it is in at least one of the states until it terminates.
trans-unit.target: Når en tråd er opprettet, er det i minst én av statuser til det avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: Threads created within the common language runtime are initially in the `Unstarted` state, while external threads that come into the runtime are already in the `Running` state.
trans-unit.target: Tråder som er opprettet i common language runtime er først i den `Unstarted` tilstand, under ekstern tråder som kommer inn under kjøring er allerede i den `Running` tilstand.

trans-unit.source: An `Unstarted` thread is transitioned into the `Running` state by calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En `Unstarted` tråd er endret i den `Running` tilstand ved å kalle <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not all combinations of `ThreadState` values are valid; for example, a thread cannot be in both the `Aborted` and `Unstarted` states.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle kombinasjoner av `ThreadState` verdiene er gyldige; for eksempel en tråd kan ikke være i begge den `Aborted` og `Unstarted` tilstander.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are two thread state enumerations,ThreadState and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ThreadState?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Det er to tråd tilstand opplistinger, ThreadState og <xref:System.Diagnostics.ThreadState?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ThreadState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the actions that cause a change of state.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser handlingene som forårsaker en endring av status.

trans-unit.source: |Action|ThreadState| |------------|-----------------| |A thread is created within the common language runtime.|Unstarted| |Another thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the new thread, and the call returns.
trans-unit.target: | Handlingen | ThreadState | |------------|-----------------| | En tråd er opprettet i common language runtime. | Ikke er startet | | Kall til en annen tråd i <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden om ny tråd og kallet returnerer.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A> method does not return until the new thread has started running.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>metoden returnerer ikke før ny tråd har begynt å kjøre.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to know at what point the new thread will start running, during the call to <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>.|Running| |The thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>|WaitSleepJoin| |The thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A> on another object.|WaitSleepJoin| |The thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> on another thread.|WaitSleepJoin| |Another thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>|Running| |Another thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A>|SuspendRequested| |The thread responds to a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A> request.|Suspended| |Another thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A>|Running| |Another thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>|AbortRequested| |The thread responds to a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> request.|Stopped| |A thread is terminated.|Stopped| In addition to the states noted above, there is also the `Background` state, which indicates whether the thread is running in the background or foreground.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å finne på hvilket tidspunkt ny tråd starter kjører under kall til <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>. | Kjører | | Tråden kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>| WaitSleepJoin | | Tråden kall <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>på et annet objekt. | WaitSleepJoin | | Tråden kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>på en annen tråd. | WaitSleepJoin | | En annen tråd kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>| Kjører | | En annen tråd kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A>| SuspendRequested | | Tråden svarer på en forespørsel om <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A>. | Utsatt | | En annen tråd kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A>| Kjører | | En annen tråd kall <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>| AbortRequested | | Tråden svarer på en forespørsel om <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>. | Stoppet | | En tråd er avsluttet. | Stoppet | I tillegg til tilstander ovenfor, finnes også i `Background` tilstand, som angir om tråden kjører i bakgrunnen eller forgrunnen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: A thread can be in more than one state at a given time.
trans-unit.target: En tråd kan ha flere enn én status om gangen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a thread is blocked on a call to <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>, and another thread calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> on the blocked thread, the blocked thread will be in both the `WaitSleepJoin` and the `AbortRequested` states at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tråd er blokkert på et kall til for eksempel <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>, og en annen tråd samtaler <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>på blokkerte tråd blir blokkert tråden i begge den `WaitSleepJoin` og `AbortRequested` tilstander samtidig.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, as soon as the thread returns from the call to <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A> or is interrupted, it will receive the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> to begin aborting.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, så tråden returnerer fra kallet til <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>eller avbrutt, den mottar den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>starter avbryter.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> </xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a thread provides the current state of a thread.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en tråd gir den gjeldende tilstanden til en tråd.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Applications must use a bitmask to determine whether a thread is running.
trans-unit.target: Programmer må bruke en bitmaske for å finne ut om en tråd kjører.

trans-unit.source: Since the value for `Running` is zero (0), test whether a thread is running by using C# code such as `(myThread.ThreadState & (ThreadState.Stopped | ThreadState.Unstarted)) == 0` or Visual Basic code such as `(myThread.ThreadState And (ThreadState.Stopped Or ThreadState.Unstarted)) = 0`.
trans-unit.target: Siden verdien for `Running` er null (0), teste om en tråd kjører ved hjelp av C#-kode, for eksempel `(myThread.ThreadState & (ThreadState.Stopped | ThreadState.Unstarted)) == 0` eller kode i Visual Basic som `(myThread.ThreadState And (ThreadState.Stopped Or ThreadState.Unstarted)) = 0`.

trans-unit.source: The thread state includes AbortRequested and the thread is now dead, but its state has not yet changed to Stopped.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden tråd inkluderer AbortRequested og tråden er nå deaktivert, men tilstanden ennå er endret ikke til stoppet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method has been invoked on the thread, but the thread has not yet received the pending <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref> that will attempt to terminate it.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden har blitt startet på tråd, men tråden ennå ikke er mottatt av ventende <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"> </xref> som prøver å avslutte den.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread is being executed as a background thread, as opposed to a foreground thread.
trans-unit.target: Tråden utføres som en bakgrunnstråd, i motsetning til en forgrunnen-tråd.

trans-unit.source: This state is controlled by setting the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne statusen er avhengig av den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread has been started, it is not blocked, and there is no pending <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tråden er startet, den ikke er blokkert, og det ikke ventende <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread has stopped.
trans-unit.target: Tråden har stoppet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread is being requested to stop.
trans-unit.target: Tråden er blir bedt om å stoppe.

trans-unit.source: This is for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: Dette er bare til intern bruk.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread has been suspended.
trans-unit.target: Tråden er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread is being requested to suspend.
trans-unit.target: Tråden er blir bedt om å stoppe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method has not been invoked on the thread.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden er ikke aktivert på tråd.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The thread is blocked.
trans-unit.target: Tråden er blokkert.

trans-unit.source: This could be the result of calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, of requesting a lock — for example, by calling <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A?displayProperty=fullName> — or of waiting on a thread synchronization object such as <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skyldes kaller <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eller <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, av ber om Lås – for eksempel ved å kalle <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eller <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A?displayProperty=fullName> , eller venter på et synkroniseringsobjekt tråd for eksempel <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>.</xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
